channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Jazz for Service Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Jazz for Service Management

item.title: CVE-2022-35722|2024-09-17T00:45:49.823Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 231381.

item.title: CVE-2021-29905|2024-09-17T01:42:05.618Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 and IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 207616.

item.title: CVE-2019-4275|2024-09-17T03:12:35.165Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3, 1.1.3.1, and 1.1.3.2 could allow an unauthorized local user to create unique catalog names that could cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 160296.
